courses.course_description:
By following the tips in this section, you will gain complete mastery of Kotlin syntax.
When you first access this section, all tips are fetched from a GitHub repository and stored locally in your phone's database. On subsequent uses, the app loads the tips directly from the database for faster access.
If new tips are added or existing ones are updated in the GitHub repository, the app automatically fetches the latest version and updates the local database accordingly.

By following the tips in this section, you will master Kotlin coroutines.
To ensure a clear understanding of the concepts, all use cases of Kotlin coroutines and flows are visualized. The app fetches and updates the tips similar to the Kotlin language course, and to access the latest visualizations and examples, you will need to update the app to the newest version.
